summary: Website with video background on home page and sage green color palette applied to all other pages
architectural_notes: Home page has video background and remains unchanged
All other pages (Contacts, About, Shopping Cart, Products) use sage green backgrounds
Sage green color palette applied cohesively across non-home pages

existing_features.title: Apply sage green background color to the Shop page (/shop route) while maintaining all existing functionality, filters, and product grid layout
Apply sage green background color to the Product Detail page (/product/:id route) while preserving all product information display, add-to-cart functionality, and related products section
Apply sage green background color to the Care Guide page (/care-guide route) while maintaining the article card layout, reading progress bar, and scroll animations
Apply sage green background color to the Checkout page (/checkout route) while preserving the multi-step form, order summary, and cart validation

new_feature_requests.summary: Apply sage green background color to all pages except home page
Keep the Home page completely unchanged, preserving the existing video background and all current styling and elements
